data.name: Zumba® Fitness (Zumba®)
data.about:
The Zumba® program is a fitness-party with a contagious blend of Latin and international rhythms that provides a fun and effective workout to a global community, either at home or in the gym. Through exhilarating, high calorie-burning fitness classes, Zumba Fitness® has helped melt the pounds and inches off more than 12 million Zumba-enthusiasts in over 125 countries. Using easy-to-follow moves and exotic, high-energy music, Zumba routines successfully tone and sculpt the body while burning fat. 

Exhilarate, the ultimate Zumba® Fitness DVD experience is available in a seven-disc DVD collection. Other offerings include Zumbawear™ apparel and accessories, Zumba Gold® classes for active older adults and deconditioned participants, Zumba® Toning, Zumbatomic® for kids, Aqua Zumba®, the "pool party" workout, as well as additional music soundtracks. For more information, to find a class, or to purchase the DVD Collection, please visit www.zumba.com.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: By transforming a chair into a sizzling dance partner, the explosive Zumba Sentao™ program strengthens your core, torches calories and sculpts muscle. Revolutionize your cardio workout with targeted resistance training and experience exotic world rhythms in red-hot, never-before-seen ways.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: By transforming a chair into a sizzling dance partner, the explosive Zumba Sentao™ program strengthens your core, torches calories and sculpts muscle. Revolutionize your cardio workout with targeted resistance training and experience exotic world rhythms in red-hot, never-before-seen ways.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: By transforming a chair into a sizzling dance partner, the explosive Zumba Sentao™ program strengthens your core, torches calories and sculpts muscle. Revolutionize your cardio workout with targeted resistance training and experience exotic world rhythms in red-hot, never-before-seen ways.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This course teaches you the foundation and formula to teach a Zumba® class. You will learn the steps to four basic rhythms (merengue, salsa, cumbia, reggaeton). You ll learn how to put these steps together into a song, and how to create your first Zumba class. We ll provide you with all the tools and resources you will need to teach a Zumba class. License: One-year basic Zumba license

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This course covers steps for four more rhythms (belly dance, flamenco, tango, samba) while reinforcing the Zumba formula for success in an easy, effective class for everyone. You'll learn advanced techniques, network and share choreography with the most dedicated and knowledgeable instructors, and spend time enhancing your professional skills. License: One-year basic Zumba license.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a current Zumba Instructor (50% off for ZIN Members).

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This course is designed for new instructors who wish to teach the active older adult and addresses the anatomical, physiological and psychological needs specific to this population. It will also prepare you to teach students just starting their journey to a fit and healthy lifestyle and who want to join the fitness-party for the first time. The Jump Start Gold Instructor Training teaches you the foundation and formula to teach a Zumba class and prepares you to teach Zumba Gold® classes by integrating the concepts of the Zumba Gold program. License: One-year basic Zumba license; Zumba Gold license as long as you are a ZIN™ Member in good standing.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This specialty course is designed for current Zumba Instructors who wish to teach the active older adult and addresses the anatomical, physiological and psychological needs specific to this population. It will also prepare you to teach students just starting their journey to a fit and healthy lifestyle and who want to join the fitness-party for the first time. The Zumba Gold® program also includes a Zumba chair workout. License: Zumba Gold license as long as you are a ZIN™ Member in good standing.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a member of the Zumba® Instructor Network (ZIN™).

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This Specialty course is the "pool party" workout for all ages. You'll learn how to teach safe, effective and challenging water-based workouts that integrate the Zumba formula and philosophy into traditional aqua fitness disciplines. License: Aqua Zumba® license as long as you are a ZIN Member in good standing. Prerequisite: Must be a member of the Zumba Instructor Network (ZIN). AEA (Aquatic Exercise Association) certification recommended.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a member of the Zumba Instructor Network (ZIN™)

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: This specialty course is designed for current Zumba® Instructors who wish to learn how to blend body-sculpting techniques and specific Zumba moves into one calorie-burning, strength-training class. You'll learn how to use weighted, maraca-like Zumba Toning Sticks to enhance rhythm, build strength and tone all the target zones. License: Zumba Toning license as long as you are a ZIN™ Member in good standing.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a member of the Zumba® Instructor Network (ZIN™). Fitness certification recommended.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value: Kids love to crank up the music, shake, wiggle and have a blast with their friends. So why not get fit while they're at it? This Specialty course teaches you how to fuse the Zumba program's unique formula with the psychology and physiology relevant to teaching kids ages 4-12. You'll learn how to modify Zumba moves to get optimal results, and receive tips on discipline and class management. License: Zumbatomic® license as long as you are a ZIN Member in good standing.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a member of the Zumba Instructor Network (ZIN).

data.name: (ISFTA) International Sports & Fitness Trainers Association (ISFTA)
data.about:
International Sports & Fitness Trainers Association (ISFTA) was founded in 2000 by a team of medical and fitness professionals with the intention of providing training at a level superior to that which had previously been available. We are members of the Institute for Credentialing Excellence (ICE), the International Health, Racquet & Sports Club Association (IHRSA), Board of Certification for Athletic Trainers (BOC) approved provider, National Certification Board for Therapeutic Massage and Bodywork (NCTMB) approved provider, a provisional affiliate of the National Board of Fitness Examiners (NBFE), and approved by many individual state boards as a continuing education provider for allied health, wellness and medical professionals. We have been providing quality education for over a decade and have some of the highest standards in the industry.

International Sports & Fitness Trainers Association (ISFTA) is one of the fastest growing providers of Fitness Certifications, Specialty Certifications & Medical Continuing Education. We offer personal instruction through LIVE courses, workshops, seminars and self paced home study with instructors who guide you through every step of the certification & educational process.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The ISFTA Personal Trainer Certification qualifies you to enter the fitness industry with the confidence to provide basic fitness training services to the general population.  Upon successful completion, you can begin a career as a Certified Personal Trainer, either working for a health club or gym, or starting your own business.  The ISFTA Personal Trainer Certification is a GREAT first step to a career in the fitness industry. Most individuals who take this course have a sincere passion for fitness and a desire to help others to choose a healthy lifestyle as well. We are known to have some of the highest standards in the industry, and when you earn your certification, you will be recognized nationwide as a fitness professional.

The investment for this class is $399, which includes your course materials, live workshop and exam fee. If you prefer, you can choose the split payment option and register for just $199.  The final payment must be made PRIOR to taking your exam.  Space is limited and the sooner you register, the more study time you will have prior to the class.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: The ISFTA Rehab Fitness Specialist course is designed to teach Physical Therapists, Occupational Therapists, Massage Therapists, Chiropractors and others in the medical field how to transition a patient from a rehab setting to a post-rehab fitness program.  During this live workshop, therapists will learn how to integrate various concepts of fitness and the physiological impact of dynamic movement to their treatment programs. Anatomy, physiology and kinesiology are examined in depth to provide a greater understanding of the body.  It also prepares the therapist to provide a more comprehensive home exercise program that is more appropriate to higher level patients.

attrs.label: Exam Delivery Method
attrs.value:
In Person
      Note: With Optional ISFTA CPT Voucher

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Category
attrs.value: Exercise Physiology, Personal Trainer, Special Populations, Sports Conditioning, Corrective Exercise, Athletic Trainer

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
During the ISFTA Stability Ball Trainer Certification one day workshop, you will learn the wide array of benefits that stability ball training can offer to your clients/patients including core strength, posture, balance, body awareness, flexibility and even cardiovascular fitness. The ISFTA Stability Ball Trainer Certification  is the most comprehensive workshop available to-date. Topics include everything from ball sizing, inflating and neutral alignment on the ball to training for dozens of exercises that you can then take and apply to your clients/patients fitness or rehab programing.

This class is open to both fitness, health/wellness and medical professionals.

Please Note: Medical Professional do not have to complete and or PASS the exam in order to obtain CE credits for license renewal.

attrs.label: Exam Delivery Method
attrs.value:
In Person
      Note: Exam requierd for certification only.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Category
attrs.value: Group Fitness, Special Populations, Sports Conditioning, Corrective Exercise, Athletic Trainer

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
The ISFTA Aqua Fitness Specialist Certification addresses the needs of a broad spectrum of potential clients, from young to old. This year-round fitness training option is low-impact and fun, making it ideal for seniors, children and everyone in-between, either one-on-one or in a large group setting. With the Aqua Fitness Specialist Certification, professionals can show clients that they have gone the extra mile to increase their fitness education with the latest facts and safety concerns in this fast growing and unique fitness field.
CEU Approvals:
4 ISFTA CEU’s

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
The ISFTA Fitness Nutrition Specialist Certification will teach you the scientifically accurate and up-to-date way to get your clients to obtain the most out of their workouts.  Topics include performance-enhancing nutrition, supplement planning and the Food and Activity Pyramid for the 7 life stages. The ISFTA Fitness Nutrition Specialist Certification will teach you the skills necessary to be able to tailor individual nutrition plans for your clients specific fitness goals and needs.
CEU Approvals:
4 ISFTA CEU’s

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Take the performance of your clients to the next level and beyond with the ISFTA Plyometrics Training Specialist Certification. Plyometric training is an essential part of conditioning for all sports requiring strength, power and speed. The ISFTA Plyometrics Training Specialist Certification will provide you with the tools and education needed to prescribe advanced plyometrics training programming to all fitness levels.
CEU Approvals: 4 ISFTA CEU’s

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: Our 2 day Intensive program includes more than 16 hours of lecture, demonstrations and practical hands-on application.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: PTIA is a premier fitness certification provider that will give you the education, skills and insight to become a valued professional, ready to enter the workforce! Our 2 day Intensive program includes more than 16 hours of lecture, demonstrations and practical hands-on application. Day 1: Classroom training; Day 2: Hands-On in the gym.

data.name: Wellcoaches
data.about:
We train the best health & wellness coaches in the world. Our training is high-impact, evidence-based, and innovative. Our community of coaches are game-changers in their industries, from clinical, to corporate, government, and consumer well-being.

Why Become a Coach?
As a Certified Wellcoach® you become an expert facilitator of mindset and behavior change that generates sustainable healthy lifestyles, which prevent or treat disease, and foster well-being and thriving. You can impact some of the toughest challenges of our times: epidemics of obesity, diabetes, sedentary lifestyles, poor nutrition, chronic stress, distracted minds, and ever-rising healthcare costs.

Wellcoaches Mission
Cultivating world-class coaches who help people rise above the barriers to good health and thriving by making lasting changes in mindset and behavior. 

What Does Wellcoaches Offer?
We offer an extraordinary Core Coach Training Program that integrates the best of coaching science with rich practical experience. The design of our Core Coach Training Program helped set national standards and certification of health and wellness coaches, launching in 2016. Our Certification Program, which follows the Core Coach Training, offers two pathways to certification: the "Certified Health and Wellness Coach" for the health professional and the "Certified Personal Coach" for the non-health professional.

certifications.title: Certified Professional Health and Wellness Coach

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
We have built an innovative and robust coaching model we call the Onward & Upward™ model designed to enable professional health and wellness coaches to help clients optimize both mental and physical well-being. The need for coaching skills is compelling given that only 20% of adults are flourishing today by two independent and validated measures. More and more evidence is emerging to show that mental flourishing improves physical health which provides the basis for health and wellness coaches helping clients envision and achieve life goals that allow them to flourish and thrive physically and mentally.
The experiential workshops provide many fun, engaging, and transformational tools and exercises that you can use in your own workshops. The training topics delivered in teleclasses and workshops cover many evidence-based domains and their translation and integration in innovative ways into coaching principles, tools, and skills. We deliver a broad and deep approach to a variety of types goals that support outgrowing of old lifestyles – including performance, skills development, behavior change, and psychological skills.

We deliver introductory training in Bob Kegan and Lisa Lahey’s “Immunity to Change” program which is an elegantly succinct model of cognitive behavioral coaching – helping coaches help clients identify and overcome “hidden” or unconscious dysfunctional patterns – allowing coaches to work with clients with challenging life situations.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Wellcoaches Core Health and Wellness Coach Certification

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value:
Looking for a new career in healthcare? Become a healthcare leader and train to become a Certified Health & Wellness Coach!  

Our coach school was an industry first to be endorsed by the American College of Sports Medicine. We specialize in supporting health and wellness professionals in:

-Understanding human behavior change 
-Leveraging the science of Positive Psychology so clients flourish and thrive 
-Utilizing Motivational Interviewing techiniques which support a client in uncovering intrinsic motivation 
-Overcoming the resistance to change and uncovering self-efficacy 

All of our coach training programs are drawn from our work in developing the core coaching competencies explored fully in the Lippincott, Williams, & Wilkins Coaching Psychology Manual.

attrs.label: Exam Price
attrs.value:
$650.00
      Note: Certification/Exam Fee is separate from Training/Program fee

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Completion of 18-week program; Education in Health and Wellness; see website for full listing of prerequisites

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
Description
attrs.value: Get Certified to do Kickboxing Fitness with proper form and technique, so that your clients stay safe and know that they are getting the real deal. Developed by World Champion Kickboxer Erik Marshall. This is NOT Cardio Kickboxing, but rather an authentic kickboxing fitness program. 20 CECs with ISSA.

attrs.label: Course Material Price

$237.50
      Note: Yes, you can pay in installments, too!

attrs.value: The Home Fitness Professionals Association/Home Fitness Training Specialist Certification and approved continuing education Course serves as the perfect way to gain real world insight into the successful running of an in-home/mobile fitness business. As the premiere program, The Home Fitness Training Specialist Course equips participants with the knowledge and practical skills needed to successfully start and grow their own in-home/ mobile fitness training business.  This course offers participants the opportunity to learn exactly what they need to know about starting an in-home/mobile fitness training business.  As a course participant, you will enhance your ability to achieve business growth and limit the challenges and pitfalls one would normally have as an in-home/mobile fitness trainer. This course was created from the business insights of several successful in-home fitness trainers.

attrs.label: Prerequisite
attrs.value: Must be a currently certified fitness trainer

data.name: Cancer Exercise Training Institute
data.about:
The Cancer Exercise Training Institute (CETI) was established in 1996 by nationally recognized author and Cancer Exercise Specialist Andrea Leonard in response to a growing need to provide scientifically-based, current information on exercise therapy as a critical component of cancer recovery.

CETI provides health and fitness professionals with comprehensive coursework on twenty-five types of cancer, their surgeries and treatments, breast reconstruction, upper and lower body lymphedema prevention, identification, and management, cancer pain and fatigue, and comprehensive fitness evaluations including postural assessment and goniometry. In addition, CETI teaches targeted marketing strategies, enabling our graduates to create strategic partnerships with the medical professionals in their community, and positioning them as the "next step" in the health care continuum.

data.name: POUND
data.about:
Pound™ is committed to bringing the exhilarating and freeing feeling of listening to and making music to your workout experience while building inner and outer beauty, cultivating self-confidence and gaining empowerment and strength. 

Pound is an aggressive exercise jam session that combines light weight with constant simulated drumming, integrating lightly weighted drumsticks (Ripstix) to activate your core, back and legs in a profound way. 

Pound is currently a 45 minute group fitness class and ACE/AFAA accredited method with a strong network of instructors and classes in LA, New York, Miami and San Francisco. It is widely present at Crunch gyms and is also offerered at specialty studios, dance studios, and for corporate wellness at Sony Pictures and The Grammys.

attrs.label: Description
attrs.value:
Pound Pro training is ACE and AFAA accredited, giving you 5.5 AFAA CEU’s and .5 CEU’s and the immediate ability to teach upon completion. Prior teaching experience and official certifications are NOT required to complete training but are recommended to enhance your marketability as a Pound Pro.

Pound Pro Training is a ONE DAY dynamic, streamlined, and comprehensive training experience. Vastly enhance your resume, skill set and appeal as an individual in the fitness community while learning the in-and-outs of instructing Pound classes at any Pound Venue in just one day. After the training, get brand new Poundtracks every single month to keep your classes fresh, exciting and challenging.

Pound is a 12-song, 45 minute sequence which is built from simple, choreographed tracks. Instructors of all backgrounds excel at teaching our blend of Pilates, Cardio and streamlining Strength Training moves. The series follows a proven sequence that provides familiarity, structure and keeps students engaged and excited to attend classes again and again.

attrs.label: One Hour of Continuing Education Equals
